channel.title: Guthan healing bugg with melee!
channel.description: So im using PI source server 517 problem is that when im hitting with melee, there comes guthan healing effect every time i deal damage. How to fix? As you can see, this purple effect that goes up from down. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3908568/bug.jpg[/img]

item.title: Guthan healing bugg with melee!
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Check out where your combat is being handled there must be something creating the graphics.

look for something in there like.
